description: Study of research methods in linguistics & a supervised research essay exploring a significant issue in the area of Linguistics. Students commencing in sem 1 enrol in LING6090; students commencing in sem 2 enrol in LING6091.
prerequisites: #16 Linguistics major incl. (LING2010 or 2040 or 2045) + (LING2000 or 2030) & GPA of at least 5 in #8 advanced LING courses.
